text: You're Barack Obama.
4 years into your retirement, you awake to find a letter with no return address on your bedside table.
It reads "I hope you've had a chance to relax Barack.
but pack your bags and call the number below.
It's time to start the real job.
" Signed simply, "JFK.

" 
You call the number and are greeted by a voice on the other end.
It is a recording.
It tells you that you are going to join the ranks of all of the past Presidents of the USA.
You are going to be a member of the Illuminati.
You are invited to a secret meeting half way across the world.
You arrive and you see all of the previous Presidents, even ones who were supposed to be dead.
You find out that the stories about the illuminati and the lizard people are real.
You happen to be the first human addition.
You find out that you all secretly control the world.
You are the puppet masters.
We discuss what needs to be done next.
We decide that the world needs to be reset.
We need to stage a collapse that would reset everything as we knew out.
The easiest way is to crash the economy.
We can invest money and profit off of it as the rest of the world crumbles.
We decide to do this.
Practically overnight it happens.
The stock market crashes and we come into a considerable amount of money.
Meanwhile the world crumbles as we had hoped.
This opens the door for us to send our people in to take over corporations.
We even buy the news so we can control it.
We decide to put our people in charge of the government next.
There is no part of the world that we don't control.
Now it's just time to start turning the citizens into lizards as well.
We decide to do this by releasing a virus that will make the people sick and eventually turn them into lizards.
Some people die during the process but the majority successfully change.
Now the planet is ours.
The next thing to do is to start taking over the rest of the universe.
That's what lizard people do after all.
